query:
(SELECT id, source, title, SUBSTRING(JSON_EXTRACT(images, '$[0].url'), 1, 80) as image_url, venue->>'$.name' as venue_name
FROM standardized_events WHERE source = 'kktix' LIMIT 2)
UNION ALL
(SELECT id, source, title, SUBSTRING(JSON_EXTRACT(images, '$[0].url'), 1, 80) as image_url, venue->>'$.name' as venue_name
FROM standardized_events WHERE source = 'indievox' LIMIT 2)
UNION ALL
(SELECT id, source, title, SUBSTRING(JSON_EXTRACT(images, '$[0].url'), 1, 80) as image_url, venue->>'$.name' as venue_name
FROM standardized_events WHERE source = 'accupass' LIMIT 2);
